title: The PC game releases we're most excited about in November
description: Contemplative sci-fi games, Call of Duty, a Persona spin-off, and other notable November releases.

title: Radiant Silvergun is finally on Steam, and I'm thrilled that its PC port does justice to one of the best shumps of all time
description: Radiant Silvergun's port full full of new graphical and scoring options is something to be Treasured.

title: Payday 3's long-overdue first patch is live: 'We’re finally up and running as things should be'
description: The patch makes a number of fixes and balance changes, but it's not enough for some fans.

title: Baldur's Gate 3's new patch made its thirstiest companion slower to warm up to you, with dire consequences for its beloved Sex% speedrun category
description: Lae'zel has suddenly developed much stricter standards.

title: Bungie issues statement to Destiny community following layoffs: 'We know we have lost a lot of your trust'
description: The Destiny 2 studio says it's committed to "exceeding your expectations" with The Final Shape expansion, but there's still no word of a delay.

title: Robocop: Rogue City review
description: I'd buy that for 20 dollars!

title: Cities: Skylines 2 patch fixes 'unnecessarily large' character textures, removes 'offensive' radio ad
description: Citizens might start hogging less processing power, though we're still not completely sure about their teeth.

title: The next Sims 4 expansion finally adds functional apartments but also eviction anxiety and malicious mold
description: The next Sims expansion delivers another long-requested feature wrapped in the dire realities of renting.

title: Where to find the Ghost House safe code in RoboCop: Rogue City
description: Break open this vault to retrieve some crime evidence.

title: I put Doritos' new noise suppression tech to the test across 5 separate crisp brands and was appalled by the results
description: Much as I wish I could, I cannot recommend Doritos Silent for your next online gaming session.

title: Samsung's monster-sized Ark gaming monitor gets a refresh and for a mere $3000, you too can hook up four PCs to the same screen
description: Not exactly the cheapest way to enjoy a LAN-cum-split-screen gaming session.

title: The Invincible review
description: This intriguing sci-fi adventure shows the value of a novel approach.

title: Elden Ring: Shadow of the Erdtree development is 'proceeding smoothly' but sorry, there's still no release date
description: The latest financial report from FromSoftware's parent company says it's going great, and not a whole lot else.

title: The Talos Principle 2 review
description: The Talos Principle 2 brings fresh human context to its beautiful world of puzzles.

title: Football Manager 2024 review
description: Despite its slow pace, this is the most engrossing Football Manager has been for years.

title: Silent Hill: Ascension underestimates the rowdiness of stream chat, who—given the wheel—crashed the whole thing into a ditch so fast they had to turn it off
description: "She Pyramid my Head till I Ascension griddy skibibi".

title: Yaaas, AMD's FSR 2.2 has finally been patched into Baldur's Gate 3
description: I am in handheld gaming PC heaven right now.

title: If Intel's latest GPU drivers are delivering a 750% fps boost in Halo imagine how bad it was before
description: Hell's bells, the game might actually run well on a Arc graphics card now.

title: AMD swaps Zen 4 cores for Zen 4c in two new entry-level laptop APUs stating 'no human being would ever know the difference'
description: Just don't call them AMD Efficient-cores, okay?

title: Baldur's Gate 3's latest patch has over 1,000 fixes—but most importantly, it lets you buy a butt-naked statue of yourself
description: You can also clean your grimey companions with soap, praise Mystra.

title: Greg Street, who quit working on the League of Legends MMO to do 'something new,' has revealed that the new thing is another MMO
description: Fantastic Pixel Castle is a new Netease studio that's currently working on an fantasy MMO codenamed Ghost.

title: 2023 gets even better for Morrowind fans as Skyrim port project gives a spooktacular look at its magical leprosy village
description: Don't mess with Morrowind fans. We have a devastating inability to let go of things that happened over 20 years ago.

title: Wordle today: Hint and answer #866 for Thursday, November 2
description: Help with the #866 Wordle if you need it.

title: 'No expense spared and not a single corner cut': After 11 months of work, one of Japan's most beloved PS2 games is finally playable in English
description: 5000 lines of English translation later, Boku no Natsuyasumi 2's fan translation is complete.
